name: 勞維俊
objective: 本課程介紹研究方法和論文寫作知識，期能培養學生獨立研究和撰寫學術報告、論文的基本能力。主要分為三部份：（一）研究內涵與步驟,（二）主要的研究方法,（三）如何撰寫英文論文及報告。涵蓋主題包括：運用圖書館資源選擇研究主題、研究計劃的撰寫、問卷調查法、訪問法、觀察法、田野工作研究方法、文獻資料分析法（內容分析法）、個案研究法、相關研究法、實驗法、文學研究法，研究報告論文格式與寫作要領，如何撰寫文獻探討，參考書目寫法等。
schedule:
Week 1/10—An Introduction to Research
Week 2/11—Choosing A Topic
Week 3/12—Identifying and Using Library Sources
Week 4/13—Using the Internet for Research
Week 5/14—Recording Information
Week 6/15—Composing and Revising
Week 7/16—Producing the Final Paper
Week 8/17—Documenting Sources Using MLA style
Week 9/18—End-of-Course Examination
materials:
Text book:
Lester, James D. and James D. Lester, Jr. Writing Research Papers: A Complete Guide. London: Longman, 2010.

References:
Walker, Lelissa. Writing Research Papers: A Norton Guide. London: W. W. Norton and Co., 1984.
Joseph Gibaldi. MLA Handbook for Writers of Research Papers. New York: Modern Language Association, 2009.
